name: Ruel Luna
body:
### Welcome to my Github page!

I'm Ruel Luna, 27, from Cebu, Philippines. (Check out my [personal website](http://ruelluna.com))

I'm a Web Developer, Team Lead and a Practrepreneur (you know, the one who practices Entrepreneurship).

I am currently handling a Team in [Binary Ideas](http://binaryideasmobile.com/). We develop websites, apps and do marketing for clients basical

This year(2015), I decided to fully pledge my time and effort to the open source world.
Checkout my [Github account](http://github.com/ruelluna) and see what you can do with my repos.

***

## [Laravel Cebu](http://facebook.com/groups/laravelcebu)
I recently formed a group here in Cebu whose sole interest is developing web applications using the Laravel Framework. The goal of the group is to help individuals to learn more about Laravel and other web technologies out there. We also help students to have adequate knowledge about programming. We do talks and meet ups once in awhile.
If you're from Cebu and want to learn Laravel with friendly vernacular-speaking guys, [then join us](https://laravel-cebu-slack.heroku.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
